attributes.action: Stop housing development on Whitleigh woods local reserve
attributes.additional_details:
Residents of whitleigh and surrounding areas encouraged to sign e-petition due to a new housing development along Whitleigh woods, if this happens local residents and children will lose recreational space. Plans have emerged today that the land along the nature reserve along Bodmin road is currently in the process of being bought by a housing developer and there will be only a ten day time frame in which this can be opposed.

Please sign to object to this sale and avoid disruption for all residents.
